title: DOES_VEHICLE_HAVE_ROOF
content:
0x8AC862B0B32C5B800xDB817403// DoesVehicleHaveRoof
BOOL DOES_VEHICLE_HAVE_ROOF(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to check for a roof presence.Returns: Returns true if the vehicle has a roof, false otherwise.Determines whether a specific vehicle is equipped with a roof.NativeDB Introduced: v323Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
if DoesVehicleHaveRoof(vehicle) then
    print("This vehicle has a roof.")
else
    print("This vehicle does not have a roof.")
end
codeBlocks:
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
if DoesVehicleHaveRoof(vehicle) then
    print("This vehicle has a roof.")
else
    print("This vehicle does not have a roof.")
end
